review: I was bitten by my cat and ended up in the hospital for 6 days with an infection in the wound.  I was put on ceftriazone through IV.  I was then sent home with a  PICC line and I was giving myself this medicine intravenously for 15 more days.  I suffered through some side effects and now I have to get treated for Clostridium difficile which is caused by long term IV antibiotic treatment.  The jury is still out on how effective it is.
Rocephin (ceftriaxone):This shot is the only shot that helps me I don't do good with pills.  I  think it's awesome.
Rocephin (ceftriaxone):Major gastrointestinal side effects including nausea and diarrhea
